readingMnemonic: The one who wrote these <kanji>article</kanji>s with such <kanji>sincerity</kanji> was Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん).
meaningMnemonic: "For the  <radical>samurai</radical>, it is a <radical>jackhammer</radical> that they will <radical>lack</radical>." That is the latest <kanji>article</kanji> of the law written about samurai, hundreds of years after katana were taken away. This article was written with great <kanji>sincerity</kanji> by the government.
